active_incidents.title: Some users may notice slow performance throughout Slack

notes.body: We’re making progress on resolving the issue, but we don’t have any new information to share at this time. We’ll keep you posted as soon as we have an update, thanks for sticking with us.
We’ve identified the cause of the issue and we’re working towards a resolution. Thank you for your continued patience.

Some users may experience slow performance throughout Slack which may affect their ability to load channels, amongst other features. We’re investigating and we’ll provide another update as soon as we have more information to share. Apologies for the disruption in the meantime.
